title: Drawing, "Four Floor Plans, Villa Stein-de Monzie, Garches, France", 1926
medium: Graphite on white wove paper, mounted on canvas
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, on left: Premiers croquis fait/ en 1926/ (Album à dessin)/ en septembre dans/ la propriéte/ "Le Lac"/ au bord du/ lac Léman: and on right: villa Stein/ à Garches/ achevée en 1927/  Le Corbusier (underlined).
provenance: Le Corbusier (Charles Edouard Jeanneret-Gris), prior to 1936
creditline: Museum purchase from James B. Ford and Peter Cooper Hewitt Estate Funds
description: Four floor plans with manuscript notations for the Villa Stein-de Monzie, Garches, France.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Four Floor Plans, Villa Stein-de Monzie, Garches, France", 1926.
1926. Graphite on white wove paper, mounted on canvas. Museum purchase from James B. Ford and Peter Cooper Hewitt Estate Funds. 1936-60-5.
